description:
It`s the day before a dance carnival in Rio, and one team`s main dancer has gone missing!  Can Arashi learn the secret behind the samba in only 1 night of practice? Can he get over the embarrassment of wearing such gaudy outfits? Can a sumo wrestler shake his hips  like that in the first place?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: リオデジャネイロ場所
